subject: Re: First Successful Recordings
author: v1230mail
full_text:

>
> I got my first successful recorded responses tonight. My first
> response was when I first got my radio and tested it out.
> Unfortunately I wasn't recording. I could have sworn that after I said
> Hi and introduced myself that someone said "Hi Aaron." Anyways, I
> posted the files in Aaron's Files under 12-469 New model. The link is

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Aaron%27s%20Files/12-469%20New%20Model/

Has it ever occurred to you, that some one or organisation, could be
using a radio to say the things you heard?

This whole radio and spirit voices, could be a MASSIVE HOAX,
perpetuated by some one with a sophisticated multi-transmission two
way radio.

Think about it.

THAT IS WHY I USE EVPmaker only to commuincate with the other dimension.
